name: koha-snippets
description: code to be pasted into Koha's admin side

scripts.build: npm run admin-js; npm run admin-scss; npm run catalog-js; npm run catalog-scss
scripts.admin-js: uglifyjs admin-js/*.js --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 > dist/IntranetUserJS.js --preamble "// minified $(date), see https://github.com/cca/koha_snippets"
scripts.catalog-js: uglifyjs catalog-js/*.js --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 > dist/OPACUserJS.js --preamble "// minified $(date), see https://github.com/cca/koha_snippets"
